definition: hard lump in the abdomen (in Chinese medicine)/crux of an issue/main point in an argument/sticking point/deadlock in negotiations
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: That is the entire stalker problem right there.
sentences.chinese: 這纔是整個跟蹤狂問題的癥結所在。

sentences.english: This is where the root-cause lies.
Instead of imagining lobotomizing us, turning us into rats, suppose we just say, look, the problem is really this.
sentences.chinese: 這次不用額葉切除術把我們變成老鼠，問題的癥結是。

sentences.english: Many people can feel the body, often lies in the support psychological.
sentences.chinese: 許多人感到身體支持不住，往往癥結在於心理上。

sentences.english: The efficience of industrial enterprises is the crux of many contradictions.
sentences.chinese: 工業企業效益差是當前許多矛盾的癥結所在。

sentences.english: Mikes explanation made the problem clear to me.
sentences.chinese: 麥克的解釋讓我明白了這個問題的癥結。
也可能癥結是他拿不出贍養費。

sentences.english: The few profit of industry is the sticking point of many contradictions currently.
sentences.chinese: 工業企業效益差是當前許多矛盾的癥結所在。

sentences.english: All the contradictions existing in industrial enterprises today boil down to scanty economic returns.
sentences.chinese: 工業企業效益差是當前許多矛盾的癥結所在。

sentences.english: How did I get the client back on track?
sentences.chinese: 我是如何幫助這家公司找到癥結，走上正軌？

sentences.english: I mean, that is why breakups and divorces exist, right?
sentences.chinese: 難道這不正是分手和離婚的癥結所在嗎？

sentences.english: So it comes down to this, Killian.
sentences.chinese: 啊，所以這就是問題的癥結，基利安。

sentences.english: Engineering are endeavoring to locate the source of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 工程師們正努力尋找問題的癥結所在。

sentences.english: The culprit of the plight is our mediocre coaches in basic levels.
sentences.chinese: 基層教練水平低下是籃球后繼乏人的癥結所在。

sentences.english: Herein lies the nub of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 這正是問題的癥結所在。

sentences.english: For News Corp., it's the reason the trouble is far from over.
sentences.chinese: 對於新聞集團來說，這也是其麻煩不斷的癥結所在。
